Here's the step-by-step solution (backwards); kcurt yot eht ni egasuas eht tup draytruoc renni eht ni kcurt yot eht nwod tup tsew draytruoc renni ta rood (dehs egarots) eht nepo etomer yot eht ta kool dna ecarret eht ot og drawrof ,thgir ,drawrof ,tfel ,tfel ,drawrof ,tfel :redro siht ni etomer eht no snottub eht hsup (!yrruh) rood eht esolc dna tsew draytruoc renni ot og worrableehw eht hsup I hope that helps. Good luck! Sincerely, Terry

Hi Kozelek,

thanks for trying the game out, I'm glad you're enjoying it

You're on the right track with the hound puzzle. The dog will follow the toy truck if you put the sausage in it, then you'll need to lead the hound into a trap.

Here's the step-by-step solution (backwards);
kcurt yot eht ni egasuas eht tup
draytruoc renni eht ni kcurt yot eht nwod tup
tsew draytruoc renni ta rood (dehs egarots) eht nepo
etomer yot eht ta kool dna ecarret eht ot og
drawrof ,thgir ,drawrof ,tfel ,tfel ,drawrof ,tfel :redro siht ni etomer eht no snottub eht hsup
(!yrruh) rood eht esolc dna tsew draytruoc renni ot og
worrableehw eht hsup

I hope that helps. Good luck!

Sincerely,
Terry
